src.main()¶

Note

Please watch the demo of QAApp

Warning

If pyinstaller path attribution is created, then add it to the resource path which will update the absolute path to the bundle folder.

>>> resource_add_path(os.path.join(sys._MEIPASS))

Kivy QAApp¶

class src.qa_app_demo.QAApp(**kwargs)¶

Bases: kivymd.app.MDApp

This is an instance of MDApp class and it is used to create and run the kivy application's life cycle.

Note

Please refer to help(QAApp) to know more.

Parameters

  • MDApp (App) -- It is inherited from Kivy App class

  • flag (boolean) -- True if an item is flagged for further investigation False otherwise. Typically triggered from the src.ui.screens.dashboard.DashBoard screen.

  • start_qa (boolean) -- True if a new transfer id is searched / barcode is scanned False if QA is completed or on page refresh Usually by clicking the "Done" or "Back" buttons in the src.ui.screens.dashboard.DashBoard screen.

  • session_state (boolean) -- True if a user logs in False otherwise.

  • update_dimension (boolean) -- True if update dimensions are required from OAK pipeline False once the user navigates to the show_override_popup().

  • barcodeData (str) -- Decoded barcode data. Currently, it supports a single barcode decoding and can be extended for multiple barcodes. Futuristic data type can be a array of strings for multiple barcode decoding.

  • master_data (dict) -- Json WMS response speicfic to a transfer id.

  • dimension (dict) -- Measured dimensions (length, width, height) from OAk.

  • override_master_data (dict) -- Updated master data (length, width, height,weight, quantity)

  • window_size (tuple) -- Size of the kivy window

  • window_w (int) -- Width of current kivy window

  • window_h (int) -- Height of current kivy window

  • _keyboard_press (int) -- Private variable to capture the key press ids

  • oak (src.core.oak_pipeline.OakPipeline) -- instance of src.core.oak_pipeline.OakPipeline

__display_frame(frame, dt)¶

Creates a new texture in the current page corresponding to the size of the processed CV frame and convert it to a byte stream. Replace the texture of the vid widget of the curernt screen.

Parameters

  • frame (np array) -- processed cv frame to be streamed

  • dt (float) -- Refers to delta-time, which is the elapsed time between the scheduling and the callback

__keydown(*args)¶

Fired when a new key is pressed down on a keybaord binded to the current window

__show_dashboard(dt)¶

Updates the measure widget (labels and text fields) in the src.ui.screens.dashboard.DashBoard screen by triggering the src.ui.screens.dashboard.DashBoard.check_measurements() method.

Parameters

dt (float) -- Refers to delta-time for scheduled call back.

__start_pipeline()¶

Configure the color_Cam, nn, stereo, mono_left and mono_right nodes. Starts the depthai pipeline and process the streaming data from OAK cam. Receives the preview, detection queue and streams the processed frame. Decodes the barcode captured in the CvFrame and updates the barcodeData and dimension attributes.

If the session_state is True and when the decoded barcodeData is available, it triggers the aaaa method to initiate the QA.

__update_dashboard_ids(dt)¶

Updates the text and label ids in the src.ui.screens.dashboard.DashBoard. Scheduled function calls with default values are made using functools.partial

Parameters

dt (float) -- Refers to delta-time, which is the elapsed time between the scheduling and the callback

__update_search_page_ids(dt)¶

Updates the widget ids in the src.ui.screens.dashboard.DashBoard. Scheduled function calls with default values are made using functools.partial

Parameters

dt (float) -- Refers to delta-time, which is the elapsed time between the scheduling and the callback

__update_window_size(*args)¶

Updates class variables with the lastest window size

build()¶

Builds a parser for parsing the main kv file by using the global kivy :builder:`Builder <>` instance. Creates a Screenmanager and adds the src.ui.screens.main_window.MainWindow, src.ui.screens.search_page.SearchPage and src.ui.screens.dashboard.DashBoard objects to the main root widget.

Note

The standard theme_cls inherited from MDApp is designed to provide the standard themes and colors as defined by Material Design.

>>> self.theme_cls.primary_palette = "Teal"
>>> self.theme_cls.primary_hue = "500"
Returns

Returns the root layout of the main kivy app

Return type

kv layout

clear_measure_widget()¶

Updates the values of the measure widget by calling src.ui.screens.dashboard.DashBoard.reset_measure_widget() method

clear_search_text()¶

Resets the search widget by calling clear_search_text() method

clear_states()¶

Flushes out the states set during the QA process

clear_weight_widget()¶

Updates the values of the weight widget by calling src.ui.screens.dashboard.DashBoard.update_widgets() method

confirm_override()¶

Submits the updated values to WMS internally by triggering src.ui.screens.dashboard.DashBoard.confirm_override() method

flag_transfer()¶

Updates the state of the flag attribute

login_keydown()¶

Detects the Enter key press and triggers user_authenticate()

popup_dismiss()¶

Dismiss popup in src.ui.screens.search_page.SearchPage and src.ui.screens.dashboard.DashBoard screens

rail_open()¶

Opens/closes the navigation rail by updating its state to close/open

search_transfer()¶

Redirects the search request to src.ui.screens.search_page.SearchPage screen. On successful search, start_qa, transfer_ID and master_data attributes are updated. Otherwise left with the defualt values.

show_override_popup()¶

Displays the override confirmation popup by triggering the src.ui.screens.dashboard.DashBoard.get_updated_measurements() method.

user_authenticate()¶

Captures the user name entered by the user from the src.ui.screens.main_window.MainWindow screen and triggers the user_authenticate() method for authentication
